title.rendered: How to purchase UPC Codes to Sell in Walmart

content.rendered:
Purchasing UPCs to sell products in Walmart can be down in just 1 minute.  Simply click on the Buy Now button below, choose the desired quantity of codes, then proceed through checkout.  After payment, you can download your codes immediately and they will also be emailed to you.  All of the codes we sell will work worldwide, and are compatible with Walmart.  Note that these platforms change their policies regularly so if you have any issues, don’t hesitate to contact us and we’ll help you.

Need codes?
